item.description:
We shall be having a public Meet Up at

Sunday, March 2, 2008, 4:00 PM

at

Village Inn Diner
699 Main Street
East Haven , CT 06512
(203) 469 5759

http://www.nearhome.c...

www.nearhome.com/needfoodnow/ct/eastshore/villiageinn/index.htm

Go to the link for a map and other information

For The Village Inn Diner.

It is next door to the McDonalds on Main Street in East Haven.

This will be a joint Unknown Zone and Coffee Talk Meet Up.

I have made no plans for after this Meet Up, but members are

Welcome to come up with some ideas.

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: This is a small restaurant. Members should be able to see me there.
item.why: Who wants to sit back to have good meal, drinks and conversation.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Another Village Inn Diner in East Haven Meet Up
